name: The Nature Game
description:
A devilish boy walks in the forest, he comes across a special energy. A heartball. He discovers that when he throws it against an animal. He has made his personal slave! His younger brother tries to stop him. Will he succeed?

Controls:

WASD = Move

E = Open Inventory

1, 2, 3 = become friends with an animal or select an animal that you are friends with.

Credits:

Game Development By: KiwiGalaxyDev

Pixel Art By: KiwiGalaxyDev

Sounds: By: KiwiGalaxyDev

Music By: Bensound
